title: Cookie monster cupcakes
ingredients: ['Cake', '200g butter', '200g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '500g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '50ml milk', 'To decorate', '1 packet marzipan', '1/2 packet icing sugar', 'chocolate drops', '1 packet desiccated coconut', 'blue food colouring', '1 packet mini chocolate chip cookies']
